17:38 <Kzim> hey  
17:39 <Kzim> we find xwiki great but we really look for a solution to display LDAP photo in xwiki is there a way to do that please ?  
17:41 <vmassol> Kzim: sorry don't know about that but I doubt it's supported right now. The person who'd know for sure is thomas mortagne but he's on holidays and will be back in 10 days. You could search the mail archive or post on the users list  
17:42 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
17:42 <Kzim> thx a lot i will, have a nice day !  
17:51 <Kzim> has quit  
17:51 <vmassol> seems that the build manager role is not working… the build has been broken for several days and nobody is doing anything about it :(  
17:52 <vmassol> buid manager need to be much more pushy
